overview:
Ken Eldred is the founder of several successful companies, including Ariba Technologies and Inmac. He also helped found and sits on the board of advisors at Crosspoint Venture Partners. Most recently he helped found Epicenter Technologies, a fast growing service center in Mumbai India.

Currently, Ken Eldred is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Living Stones Foundation, a public support organization with $100 million in assets to fund Christian work and charity around the world. He is a visiting Hoover Fellow at Stanford University and served on the Board of Trustees for Regent University. Mr. Eldred has served on the Finance Committee for the George W. Bush campaign and is an elder for Yoido Full Gospel church in Seoul Korea, founded by Dr. David Yonggi Cho.
